abstract: Twenty-five years ago Steven T. Kirsch built a better mouse. Now he believes he has found a way to create a better trap for spam.
snippet: Twenty-five years ago Steven T. Kirsch built a better mouse. Now he believes he has found a way to create a better trap for spam.
lead_paragraph: SANTA CLARA, Calif.  Twenty-five years ago Steven T. Kirsch built a better mouse. Now he believes he has found a way to create a better trap  for spam, not mice  if he has enough time to finish his project.

headline.main: Spam’s End? Maybe, if Time Allows
headline.print_headline: Spam’s End? Maybe, if Time Allows
